article: Yesterday I totally changed my views about life after a talk with one of my friends. He told me despite being in debt , he was happy and _ that it was because of something he saw in India. A few years ago he was _ feeling sad and was touring India.He said right in front of his very eyes, he saw an Indian mother cut off her child's right hand with a knife.The helpless _ in the mother's eyes and the painful scream of the _ four-year-old child still remained in his mind. The _ mother made the child handicapped (disabled) so that he could go out on the streets to beg. _ by the scene, he dropped a small piece of bread he was eating.And almost at once, several children _ around this small piece of bread covered with sand, _ bits from one another.It was the _ reaction of hunger.He then went to the nearest bakery and bought every single loaf of bread. _ he gave out the bread to the children (mostly handicapped), he _ cheers and bows from these _ children.For the first time in his life, he understood _ people could give up their _ for a loaf of bread.He came to _ how fortunate he was to be able to have a sound body, have a job, have a family, have the chance to _ about food that didn't taste good, and have the many things that these people in front of him _ dreamed of having.Perhaps life wasn't bad at all.
